anime.name: Dr.Stone: New World
anime.introduction: Dr. Stone is a Japanese manga series written by Riichiro Inagaki and illustrated by the South Korean artist Boichi. It was serialized in Shueisha's Weekly Shōnen Jump from March 2017 to March 2022, with its chapters collected in 26 tankōbon volumes.

anime.name: Majutsushi Orphen
anime.introduction: Sorcerous Stabber Orphen (魔術士オーフェン, Majutsushi Ōfen, lit. 'Sorcerer Orphen' is a Japanese light novel series written by Yoshinobu Akita. It was adapted into manga, five anime television series (Sorcerous Stabber Orphen, Sorcerous Stabber Orphen 2: Revenge, Sorcerous Stabber Orphen (2020), Sorcerous Stabber Orphen: Battle of Kimluck, Sorcerous Stabber Orphen: Chaos in Urbanrama) and a video game.

anime.name: Cool Doji Danshi
anime.introduction: Play It Cool, Guys is a Japanese web manga series written and illustrated by Kokone Nata. It has been serialized on the Pixiv website since February 2019, with its chapters collected into five tankōbon volumes as of October 2022. An anime television series adaptation by Pierrot aired from October 2022 to March 2023.

anime.name: Cardfight!! Vanguard
anime.introduction: Cardfight!! Vanguard is a Japanese multimedia franchise jointly created by Akira Itō, Satoshi Nakamura, Mitsuhisa Tamura, and Bushiroad president Takaaki Kidani. It currently consists of multiple anime television series, an official trading card game, a manga series, and an anime/live action film.

anime.name: Kizuna no Allele
anime.introduction: Miracle attends ADEN Academy to learn new skills to follow her dreams of being a virtual artist.

anime.name: Shadowverse Flame
anime.introduction: Shadowverse Flame (シャドウバース フレイム, shadoubaasu fureimu), also known as Shadowverse F, is TV anime series loosely based on Shadowverse, which began airing on April 2nd, 2022. A manga based on the series is being serialized in Monthly Corocoro Comic.

anime.name: Oshi no Ko
anime.introduction: Oshi no Ko is a Japanese manga series written by Aka Akasaka and illustrated by Mengo Yokoyari. It has been serialized in Shueisha's Weekly Young Jump since April 2020, with its chapters collected in 11 tankōbon volumes as of March 2023.

anime.name: Malevolent Spirits: Mononogatari
anime.introduction: Malevolent Spirits: Mononogatari (Japanese: もののがたり, Hepburn: Mononogatari) is a Japanese manga series written and illustrated by Onigunsou.

anime.name: Tsurune: Tsunagari no Issha
anime.introduction: 'Tsurune' is indisputably one of the most serene and captivating (sports) anime to indulge in. Peppered with its share of comedic moments.

anime.name: Tondemo Skill de Isekai Hourou Meshi
anime.introduction: Campfire Cooking in Another World with My Absurd Skill is a Japanese light novel series written by Ren Eguchi. The series originated on the Shōsetsuka ni Narō website in January 2016, before being published in print with illustrations by Masa by Overlap beginning in November 2016 under their Overlap Novels imprint.

anime.name: Dragon Raja
anime.introduction: Developed with the established and industry-leading engine UE4, Dragon Raja is an incredible Fantasy MMORPG with stunning graphics.

anime.name: Gaikotsu Shotenin Honda-san
anime.introduction: Skull-face Bookseller Honda-san is a Japanese comedy manga series by Honda, serialized online via pixiv Comic website between August 2015 and March 2019. It was collected in four tankōbon volumes by Media Factory. The manga is licensed in North America by Yen Press.

anime.name: Bungou Stray Dogs
anime.introduction: Bungo Stray Dogs is a Japanese manga series written by Kafka Asagiri and illustrated by Sango Harukawa, which has been serialized in Kadokawa Shoten's seinen manga magazine Young Ace since 2012.

anime.name: Chainsaw Man
anime.introduction: Chainsaw Man follows the story of Denji, an impoverished young man who makes a contract that fuses his body with that of a dog-like devil named Pochita.

anime.name: Yi Nian Yong Heng: Chuan Cheng Pian
anime.introduction: A Will Eternal tells the tale of Bai Xiaochun, an endearing but exasperating young man who is driven primarily by his fear of death and desire to live forever, but who deeply values friendship and family.
